text:
From 10 Aug:
Up to 5 passengers for taxis/PHCs, excluding the driver (yes, e.g. MPV taxis/6-seater PHCs. Normal taxis will continue to take only 4 pax as per their vehicle capacity limit)
Paid car-pooling services that are matched through licensed ride-hail platforms, such as GrabHitch and RydePool, may resume
Masks continue to be mandatory
